Thunderstorm: Wha the heck? You know this guy? What's basketball and 
hockey anyways? (He does not know what these are because he has never 
even heard of planet earth)

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> Seeing Gorzo Rhesus wildly ran toward him and started shaking his 
> hand.
> 
> Rhesus: HI I'M RHESUS! YOU'RE GORZO RIGHT! IF YOU ARE I'M SURE BY 
NOW 
> EVERYONE ON CYBERTRON KNOWS YOUR FACE! I WAS AT THAT GAME AGAINST 
THE 
> BALLERS YOU WON 5 STELLAR CYCLES AGO, BUT RIGHT AFTER THAT I GOT 
> SHIPED OFF TO THIS SLAG SUCKING OUTPOST THAT DOESN'T GET THE SPORTS 
> PAGE! SO WHAT HAPPENED! HOW BIG ARE YOU NOW!
> 
> Mustex: Basketball sucks. Give me hockey any day (me too).
> 
> Mustex has a quick minor league flashback playing for the Argustian 
> Lynx (LETS GO AGUSTA LYNX) in the ECHL (East Coast Hockey League) 
and 
> getting injutred, and scared to death and enlisting in the military.
> 
> OOC: I think I had said they were there for 10 stellar cycles, but 
if 
> I'm deniging Stallex is a kid why not denige other stuff. I 
> probably won't follow up on Mustex being a hockey player that was 
just 
> in there for laughs.
> 
> Mustex: Now pass the pizza and help us get this thing into the 
water.
> 
> He indicates the shuttle and points to the small opening into the 
> stream.
> 
> Mustex: Mutate's off trying to figure out what's going on on this 
> planet.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
